sentence.Network_en: Rose and I differ somewhat in our definition of art. Not to impugn your work, sir.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们在艺术上的见解颇有分歧,我不是在批评你的作品.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...approval(捐赠获得收入/背书获得同意)反义词：oppose publicly(公开反对); impugn(指责)(记) en+dorse(背)→在背后签字

list.abs: don ' t dare impugn me honor , boy ., 别诋毁我的信誉 , 孩子.
新GRE高频词汇反义词练习翻译答案版_yangbhp... ... 54 Sullied 玷污的 B impugned 指责的 C damaged 伤害的.
impugn sb's motives , actions , morals , etc怀疑某人的动机、行为、品行等。
and I differ somewhat in our definition of fine art . not to impugn your work , sir .我们在艺术上的见解颇有分歧，我不是在批评你的作品。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (also in the sense 'assault, attack physically'): from Latin impugnare 'assail', from in- 'towards' + pugnare 'fight'

entry.tran: 指责,非难,质疑(他人的动机、诚信等)
entry.def: If you impugn something such as someone's motives or integrity, you imply that they are not entirely honest or honourable.

example.ex: The Secretary's letter questions my veracity and impugns my motives...
example.tran: 部长的来信怀疑我的诚实,质疑我的动机。

example.ex: All I can hope is that the good name of the Bank will not be impugned in some way.
example.tran: 我所希望的,就是该银行的好名声不要在某些方面受到质疑。

auth_sentence.content: How dare you impugn these people's reputation?
auth_sentence.res_content: How dare you impugn these people's reputation?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How dare you impugn these people's reputation?

auth_sentence.content: The Venetian law Cannot impugn you as you do proceed.
auth_sentence.res_content: The Venetian law Cannot impugn you as you do proceed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The Venetian law Cannot impugn you as you do proceed.

auth_sentence.content: I wish in no way to impugn the potential validity of gradualism.
auth_sentence.res_content: I wish in no way to impugn the potential validity of gradualism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I wish in no way to impugn the potential validity of gradualism.

re回+pugn打+ant……的→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶的
re回+pugn打+ance表名词→[把人]打回去→[行为]令人厌恶
